title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Testing
description: Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) is widely used to prevent, diagnose, and treat diseases. TCM preparations usually include herbs, extracts, shell, animal bone, and/or minerals in varying combinations. Because TCM preparations are not well regulated and can be very diverse, TCM quality and safety testing is important to ensure that preparations are free from toxic heavy metal contamination, pesticide residues, and adulterants. Agilent provides solutions for quality and safety testing of Traditional Chinese medicines.
